markdownRemark.html:
• Mandating inclusivity training for all students, staff, faculty, and administrators.
  • Providing resources for students and faculty including outreach, advocacy, counseling, and networking.
  • Having a helpline/aid services to report cases of misconduct anonymously or for supportive purposes.
  • Promoting LGBTQ+ friendly greek life.
  • Using gender-inclusive language in all communications and signage.
  • Increasing available housing, restrooms, health services, resources, and locker rooms.
  • Holding LGBTQ+ friendly homecoming and prom events.
  • Motivating students to express themselves and enforce any dress code related regulations equally regardless of gender.
  • Sponsoring more student organizations that support the LGBTQ+ community.
  • Providing gender and sexuality inclusive sexual health services and education.
  • Offering LGBTQ+ issue focused courses regardless of major.
  • Holding awareness weeks/months.
